free_text.Learning outcomes: In this course, students learn how to design, implement and use relational spatial databases (DB) and GIS. They acquire the following knowledge:[br/]-	Basic knowledge of GIS and DB and their principal components and functionalities.[br/]-	Skills to independently use a GIS and a DB to search and represent spatial data.[br/]-	Solid competences in conceptual modeling and implementation of spatial databases.[br/][br/][br/]
free_text.Content: [li]	Digital representation of spatial information[br/][li]	Data gathering et updating techniques, topological data consolidation[br/][li]	GIS software architecture[br/][li]	Data exchange and GIS interoperability[br/][li]	Conceptual modeling of spatial databases and GIS : [br/]   -	Conceptual modeling of spatial data structures, UML, [br/]   -	Process modeling,[br/]   -	Model implementation in GIS and in relational databases,[br/]   -	General GIS analysis and design methodology.[br/][li]	Implementation and use of databases and GIS via SQL[br/][br/][br/][br/][br/]Hands-on exercises are trained on the Manifold GIS software. [br/]Students can also use ArcGIS / ArcView GIS components[br/]
free_text.Type of teaching: Ex-cathedra, with exercises in the classroom, practical on a computer
free_text.Prerequisite for: GIS, Geomatics and Systems of environmental managements[br/]
free_text.Form of examination: 30 % spot check during the semester (with bonus system)[br/]70 % final written test (180 min) during the exam session

free_text.Objectifs d'apprentissage: Ce cours permet aux étudiants de se former aux tâches de conception, d'implémentation et d'utilisation des bases de données spatiale relationnelles (BD) et des SIG. Il leur permet notamment d'acquérir les compétences suivantes:[br/]-	Connaissances de base des SIG et des BD et de leurs principales composantes et fonctions.[br/]-	Capacité d'utiliser de manière autonome un SIG et une BD pour rechercher et représenter des informations spatiales.[br/]-	Compétences solides pour la modélisation conceptuelle et l'implémentation de bases de données spatiales.[br/]
